t: Why You Shouldn’t Buy Candy on Amazon or Third-Party Shippers
s: January 22, 2025 - Candy can be sensitive to extreme temperatures. Chocolates can melt, gummies can get sticky, and hard candies can crack or crystallize when exposed to heat or cold. Unfortunately, third-party sellers on platforms like Amazon often lack proper temperature control during storage and shipping.

t: 26 Incredibly Delicious Candies You Can Get On Amazon
s: June 13, 2022 - Every flavor tastes amazing, but my favorite candies are the coke, Ramune (it says Lamune), apple, and melon. Heads up—apple tastes so unreal compared to its artificial counterpart. For the price I bought this, and the quantity, this is totally the best deal out on Amazon!
